page.title: 12SHILDON SCHOOLS-2
page.content: In 1974 St. John's C.E.(cont.) Primary school was transfered to a new site on the Jubilee Fields housing estate next to Sunnydale Comp.School.About 180 children attend this school, and a further 140 attend Jubilee Infants school,which shares the same site,and was built in 1976.Present LEA. proposals are to amalgamate the 2 schools to form a new C.E.Aided school in July 1986.All Saints' CE.(Cont) school has 120 pupils aged 4-11, and was built in 1875 next to All Saints' church. LEA.proposals are to close this school in July 1986,but the local community,which strongly supports the school,have set up an Action Group and have lobbied councillors,MP's and others with some success. The outcome of the future of the school is still not decided.
